parameters.name: cfg

param_schema.title: Cfg
param_schema.description: Classifier-Free Guidance scale - higher values encourage adherence to prompt, lower values encourage more creative interpretation

parameters.description: Classifier-Free Guidance scale - higher values encourage adherence to prompt, lower values encourage more creative interpretation

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: A fixed random seed for reproducible results (omit this parameter for a randomized seed)

parameters.description: A fixed random seed for reproducible results (omit this parameter for a randomized seed)

parameters.name: steps

param_schema.title: Steps
param_schema.description: The number of diffusion steps to perform during generation (more steps generally improves image quality but increases processing time)

parameters.description: The number of diffusion steps to perform during generation (more steps generally improves image quality but increases processing time)

parameters.name: width

param_schema.description: The width of the generated images in pixels

parameters.description: The width of the generated images in pixels

parameters.name: height

param_schema.description: The height of the generated images in pixels

parameters.description: The height of the generated images in pixels

parameters.name: prompt

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.description: A text description guiding the relighting and generation process

parameters.description: A text description guiding the relighting and generation process

parameters.name: light_source

param_schema.description: The type and position of lighting to apply to the initial background latent

parameters.description: The type and position of lighting to apply to the initial background latent

parameters.name: highres_scale

param_schema.title: Highres Scale
param_schema.description: The multiplier for the final output resolution relative to the initial latent resolution

parameters.description: The multiplier for the final output resolution relative to the initial latent resolution

parameters.name: output_format

param_schema.description: The image file format of the generated output images

parameters.description: The image file format of the generated output images

parameters.name: subject_image

param_schema.title: Subject Image
param_schema.description: The main foreground image to be relighted

parameters.description: The main foreground image to be relighted

parameters.name: compute_normal

param_schema.title: Compute Normal
param_schema.description: Whether to compute the normal maps (slower but provides additional output images)

parameters.description: Whether to compute the normal maps (slower but provides additional output images)

parameters.name: output_quality

param_schema.title: Output Quality
param_schema.description: The image compression quality (for lossy formats like JPEG and WebP). 100 = best quality, 0 = lowest quality.

parameters.description: The image compression quality (for lossy formats like JPEG and WebP). 100 = best quality, 0 = lowest quality.

parameters.name: appended_prompt

param_schema.title: Appended Prompt
param_schema.description: Additional text to be appended to the main prompt, enhancing image quality

parameters.description: Additional text to be appended to the main prompt, enhancing image quality

parameters.name: highres_denoise

param_schema.title: Highres Denoise
param_schema.description: Controls the amount of denoising applied when refining the high resolution output (higher = more adherence to the upscaled latent, lower = more creative details added)

parameters.description: Controls the amount of denoising applied when refining the high resolution output (higher = more adherence to the upscaled latent, lower = more creative details added)

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.default: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, cropped, worst quality

param_schema.title: Negative Prompt
param_schema.default: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, cropped, worst quality
param_schema.description: A text description of attributes to avoid in the generated images

parameters.description: A text description of attributes to avoid in the generated images

parameters.name: background_image

param_schema.title: Background Image
param_schema.description: The background image that will be used to relight the main foreground image

parameters.description: The background image that will be used to relight the main foreground image

parameters.name: number_of_images

param_schema.title: Number Of Images
param_schema.description: The number of unique images to generate from the given input and settings

parameters.description: The number of unique images to generate from the given input and settings

output_quality.description: The image compression quality (for lossy formats like JPEG and WebP). 100 = best quality, 0 = lowest quality.
